io.nem.core.crypto.ed25519.arithmetic

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.core.crypto.ed25519.arithmetic.MathUtils

  • public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to help with calculations.

    • Method Detail

      • toBigInteger

        public static java.math.BigInteger toBigInteger(int[] t)
        Converts a 2^25.5 bit representation to a BigInteger. Value: 2^EXPONENTS[0] * t[0] + 2^EXPONENTS[1] * t[1] + ... + 2^EXPONENTS[9] * t[9]
        Parameters:
        t - The 2^25.5 bit representation.
        Returns:
        The BigInteger.

      • toBigInteger

        public static java.math.BigInteger toBigInteger(byte[] bytes)
        Converts a 2^8 bit representation to a BigInteger. Value: bytes[0] + 2^8 * bytes[1] + ...
        Parameters:
        bytes - The 2^8 bit representation.
        Returns:
        The BigInteger.

      • reduceModGroupOrder

        public static Ed25519EncodedFieldElement reduceModGroupOrder(Ed25519EncodedFieldElement encoded)
        Reduces an encoded field element modulo the group order and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        encoded - The encoded field element.
        Returns:
        The mod group order reduced encoded field element.

      • multiplyAndAddModGroupOrder

        public static Ed25519EncodedFieldElement multiplyAndAddModGroupOrder(Ed25519EncodedFieldElement a,
                                                                     Ed25519EncodedFieldElement b,
                                                                     Ed25519EncodedFieldElement c)
        Calculates (a * b + c) mod group order and returns the result. a, b and c are given in 2^8 bit representation.
        Parameters:
        a - The first integer.
        b - The second integer.
        c - The third integer.
        Returns:
        The mod group order reduced result.

      • getRandomByteArray

        public static byte[] getRandomByteArray(int length)
        Creates and returns a random byte array of given length.
        Parameters:
        length - The desired length.
        Returns:
        The random byte array.

      • getRandomFieldElement

        public static Ed25519FieldElement getRandomFieldElement()
        Gets a random field element where |t[i]| <= 2^24 for 0 <= i <= 9.
        Returns:
        The field element.

      • getRandomEncodedFieldElement

        public static Ed25519EncodedFieldElement getRandomEncodedFieldElement(int length)
        Returns a random 32 byte encoded field element.
        Returns:
        The encoded field element.

      • getRandomGroupElement

        public static Ed25519GroupElement getRandomGroupElement()
        Gets a random group element in P3 coordinates. It's NOT guaranteed that the created group element is a multiple of the base point.
        Returns:
        The group element.

      • getRandomEncodedGroupElement

        public static Ed25519EncodedGroupElement getRandomEncodedGroupElement()
        Gets a random encoded group element. It's NOT guaranteed that the created encoded group element is a multiple of the base point.
        Returns:
        The encoded group element.

      • toGroupElement

        public static Ed25519GroupElement toGroupElement(byte[] bytes)
        Creates a group element from a byte array. Bit 0 to 254 are the affine y-coordinate, bit 255 is the sign of the affine x-coordinate.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte array.
        Returns:
        The group element.

      • getAffineXFromAffineY

        public static java.math.BigInteger getAffineXFromAffineY(java.math.BigInteger y,
                                                         boolean shouldBeNegative)
        Gets the affine x-coordinate from a given affine y-coordinate and the sign of x.
        Parameters:
        y - The affine y-coordinate
        shouldBeNegative - true if the negative solution should be chosen, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The affine x-ccordinate.

      • toRepresentation

        public static Ed25519GroupElement toRepresentation(Ed25519GroupElement g,
                                                   CoordinateSystem newCoordinateSystem)
        Converts a group element from one coordinate system to another. This method is a helper used to test various methods in Ed25519GroupElement.
        Parameters:
        g - The group element.
        newCoordinateSystem - The desired coordinate system.
        Returns:
        The same group element in the new coordinate system.

      • addGroupElements

        public static Ed25519GroupElement addGroupElements(Ed25519GroupElement g1,
                                                   Ed25519GroupElement g2)
        Adds two group elements and returns the result in P3 coordinate system. It uses BigInteger arithmetic and the affine coordinate system. This method is a helper used to test the projective group addition formulas in Ed25519GroupElement.
        Parameters:
        g1 - The first group element.
        g2 - The second group element.
        Returns:
        The result of the addition.

      • doubleGroupElement

        public static Ed25519GroupElement doubleGroupElement(Ed25519GroupElement g)
        Doubles a group element and returns the result in the P3 coordinate system. It uses BigInteger arithmetic and the affine coordinate system. This method is a helper used to test the projective group doubling formula in Ed25519GroupElement.
        Parameters:
        g - The group element.
        Returns:
        g+g.

      • scalarMultiplyGroupElement

        public static Ed25519GroupElement scalarMultiplyGroupElement(Ed25519GroupElement g,
                                                             Ed25519FieldElement f)
        Scalar multiply the group element by the field element.
        Parameters:
        g - The group element.
        f - The field element.
        Returns:
        The resulting group element.

      • doubleScalarMultiplyGroupElements

        public static Ed25519GroupElement doubleScalarMultiplyGroupElements(Ed25519GroupElement g1,
                                                                    Ed25519FieldElement f1,
                                                                    Ed25519GroupElement g2,
                                                                    Ed25519FieldElement f2)
        Calculates f1 * g1 - f2 * g2.
        Parameters:
        g1 - The first group element.
        f1 - The first multiplier.
        g2 - The second group element.
        f2 - The second multiplier.
        Returns:
        The resulting group element.

        Parameters:
        g - The group element.
        Returns:
        The negated group element.
